00018         var $table                      = "permissions";

00020         var $nodeType           = "qcl.auth.types.Permission";
00021         var $shortName          = "permission";
00022         var $foreignKey         = "permissionId";

00037    // public non-rpc methods

00045         function getByRoleId($roleId = null)
00046         {
00047                 $result = array();
00048                 $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->table_link_roles_permissions} ";
00049                 if ( ! is_null ( $roleId ) )
00050                 {
00051                         $roleIdList = implode (",", (array) $roleId );
00052                         $sql .= "WHERE `{$this->role->foreignKey}` IN ($roleIdList)";
00053                 }
00054                 $rows = $this->db->getAllRows($sql);
00055                 foreach ( $rows as $row )
00056                 {
00057                         $permissionId = $row[$this->foreignKey];
00058                         $roleId = $row[$this->role->foreignKey];
00059                         $result[$permissionId][] = $roleId; 
00060                 }
00061                 return $result;
00062         } 
00063 
00069     function addToRole( $permissionRefs, $roleRefs )
00070     {
00071         $permissionRefs = (array) $permissionRefs;
00072         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00073         
00074         foreach ($permissionRefs as $permissionRef)
00075         {
00076                 $permissionId = $this->getIdFromRef($permissionRef);
00077                 if ( ! $permissionId )
00078                 {
00079                         $this->raiseError("Invalid permission reference: $permissionRef");
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00083                 {
00084                         $roleId = qcl_auth_role::getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00085                         if ( !$roleId ) continue;
00086                         $row = array();
00087                         $row[$this->role->foreignKey] = $roleId;
00088                         $row[$this->foreignKey] = $permissionId; 
00089                         $this->db->insert($this->table_link_roles_permissions,$row);
00090                 }
00091         }
00092         return true;
00093     }
00094    
00100     function removeFromRole( $permissionRefs, $roleRefs )
00101     {
00102         $permissionRefs = (array) $permissionRefs;
00103         $roleRefs       = (array) $roleRefs;
00104         
00105         foreach ($permissionRefs as $permissionRef)
00106         {
00107                 $permissionId = $this->getIdFromRef($permissionRef);
00108                 
00109                 if ( ! $permissionId )
00110                 {
00111                         $this->raiseError("Invalid permission reference: $permissionRef");
00112                 }
00113                 
00114                 foreach ( $roleRefs as $roleRef )
00115                 {
00116                         $roleId = qcl_auth_role::getIdFromRef($roleRef);
00117                         if ( !$roleId ) continue;
00118                                 $this->db->execute("
00119                                         DELETE FROM `{$this->table_link_roles_permissions}`
00120                                         WHERE   `{$this->foreignKey}` = $permissionId
00121                                         AND     `{$this->role->foreignKey}` = $roleId
00122                                 ");
00123                 }
00124         }
00125         return "OK";
00126     }   
00127    
00128    //-------------------------------------------------------------
00129    // public rpc methods

00138     function method_addToRole($params)
00139     {
00140         $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00141         
00142         $permissionRefs         = $params[1];
00143         $roleRefs                       = $params[2];
00144         
00145         $this->addToRole($permissionRefs,$roleRefs); 
00146         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.permission.roleAdded",$permissionRefs);
00147         return $this->getResult();
00148     }
00149    
00156     function method_removeFromRole($params)
00157     {
00158         $this->user->requirePermission("qcl.auth.manage");
00159         
00160         $permissionRefs         = $params[1];
00161         $roleRefs                       = $params[2];
00162 
00163         $this->removeFromRole($permissionRefs,$roleRefs);
00164 
00165         $this->addMessage("qcl.auth.messages.permission.roleRemoved",$permissionRefs); 
00166         return $this->getResult();
00167     }
